Indication: Chickens - For control of infections of large roundworms (Ascaris galli) ~ cecal worms (Heterakis gallinae) ~ and capillary worms (Capillaria obsignata)
Limitations: Use in complete feed. Withdraw 3 days before slaughter
SpecialConsiderations: (1) Federal law restricts medicated feed containing this veterinary feed directive (VFD) drug to use by or on the order of a licensed veterinarian. See ยง558.6 for additional requirements. (2) The expiration date of VFDs for hygromycin B medicated feeds must not exceed 6 months from the date of issuance. VFDs for hygromycin B shall not be refilled.
